pullrequest.title: Upgrade Windows dependencies for Gazebo and build support

content.raw: Sorry for the late reply and happy new year btw. That’s the Chocolatey server we hosted for porting ROS on Windows \([https://roswin.azurewebsites.net/](https://roswin.azurewebsites.net/)\). Many binaries are built by using vcpkg, and they are getting updated in ad-hoc way. For Gazebo CI, I would recommend to keep using vcpkg if you already plan doing so.
content.html: Sorry for the late reply and happy new year btw. That’s the Chocolatey server we hosted for porting ROS on Windows (https://roswin.azurewebsites.net/). Many binaries are built by using vcpkg, and they are getting updated in ad-hoc way. For Gazebo CI, I would recommend to keep using vcpkg if you already plan doing so.
